title: S13 Ep49: Overnight Explorations of Some of America's Most Haunted Locations
itunes:title: Overnight Explorations of Some of America's Most Haunted Locations
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS goes alone on Overnight Explorations of Some of America's Most Haunted Locations with guest Patrick Orozco

Solo ghost hunter Patrick Henry Orozco visited known haunted locations around America, armed only with a small flashlight, video cameras, and audio recorders.

Alone until the sun rises in these spooky buildings, unburdened by large production crews and over-sized equipment, the explorer is free to focus on the main objective of these supernatural outings: observing and documenting. Tonight he shares his story and sightings of the supernatural that changed his life.

Get the book here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio
